tool.name: PPEPP
tool.description: Paradigm Phage Early Promoter Project. Finds promoters that ought to be expressed by unmodified host RNA polymerase, utilising HMMR3 databases curated from T3, T5, T7, P1, P2, P4, and 186
tool.command:
bin/cpt_ppepp.pl --galaxy --outfile_supporting $__new_file_path__ --file "${file}"
--lookahead_dist "${lookahead_dist}"
#if $evalue and $evalue is not "None": --evalue "${evalue}" #end if
#if $inc and $inc is not "None": --inc "${inc}" #end if
#if $f1 and $f1 is not "None": --f1 "${f1}" #end if
#if $f2 and $f2 is not "None": --f2 "${f2}" #end if
#if $f3 and $f3 is not "None": --f3 "${f3}" #end if
#if $domz and $domz is not "None": --domz "${domz}" #end if
--report "${report}"
--report_files_path "${report.files_path}"
--report_format "${report_format}"
--report_id "${report.id}"

param.name: evalue
param.help: report sequences <= this E-value threshold in output
param.label: evalue

param.name: inc
param.help: consider sequences <= this E-value threshold as significant
param.label: inc

param.name: f1
param.help: Stage 1 (MSV) threshold: promote hits w/ P <= F1
param.label: f1

param.name: f2
param.help: Stage 1 (Vit) threshold: promote hits w/ P <= F2
param.label: f2

param.name: f3
param.help: Stage 1 (Fwd) threshold: promote hits w/ P <= F3
param.label: f3

param.name: domz
param.help: set # of significant seqs, for domain E-value calculation
param.label: domz
